input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item title, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item title:
Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter with Double Lock Miter and 3/4-Inch Bore

Item specifications:
Grizzly 3/4-Inch bore shaper cutters feature top-quality c-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications shaped and sharpened with dam
Double Lock Miter
Cutting length: 1-Inch
Can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Grizzly 1-Inch bore shaper cutter features top-quality C-2 carbide--the best available for wood cutting applications--shaped and sharpened with diamond abrasives for maximum cutting life. These double-locked miter cutters feature a high-quality steel body for strength and precision. All are individually straightened and heat-treated for accuracy. For accurate cuts, these cutters must be used in conjunction with a properly functioning shaper cutterhead and a good quality cutterholder. For best results, a cutterhead with spiral-flute cutting teeth should be used. These cutters can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at speeds of 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.
input_text.Response B: The Grizzly C2125 Shaper Cutter has a double lock miter and a 3/4-Inch bore.  It is made of top-quality carbide and can be used on wood, composites, plywood, and some plastics at 5,000 to 10,000 rpm.  The cutting length is 1-Inch.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is good whilst Response B is too short and doesn't confirm to the AIDA framework
